S06n580:1: atha khalu bhagavān punarapyāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma-yasmin khalu punarānanda samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06n580:4: tasmin ānanda samaye ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ,
S06n580:5: te sarve saṃśayitā bhavanti-kimayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'ntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkariṣyati śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā,
S06n580:7: punaraparamānanda tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ śokaśalyaviddhā bhavanti yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati |
S06n580:8: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06n580:11: tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya viheṭhāmupasaṃharanti,
S06n580:14: digdāhānupadarśayanti-apyeva nāma ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'valīyeta vā romaharṣo vā asya bhavet,
S06n580:16: tatra ānanda na sarvasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06n580:19: ānanda āha-kiyadrūpasya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya upasaṃkrāmati māraḥ pāpīyān viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ?
S06n580:20: bhagavānāha-yena ānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmadhimukticittaṃ notpāditaṃ bhavati,
S06n580:21: asya ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06n580:23: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ saṃśayaprāpto bhavati,
S06n580:26: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06n580:28: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahito bhavati,
S06n580:30: sa gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na śṛṇoti,
S06n580:33: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06n580:35: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'saddharmaparigrāhakamālīno bhavati-eṣa mama sahāyakaḥ,
S06n580:37: bahavo'pi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mamānye'pi sahāyakāḥ santi |
S06n580:39: ayaṃ tu mayā pratirūpaḥ sahāyo labdhaḥ |
S06n580:41: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06n580:43: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmanyaṃ bodhisattvamevaṃ vadet-gambhīrā bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā |
S06n580:45: na hyevamatra yujyamānamanyeṣu sūtrānteṣu yathā tathāgatena bhāṣitam |
S06n580:49: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06n580:51: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nyān bodhisattvānavamanyate-ahaṃ vivekavihāreṇa viharāmi,
S06n580:54: tasminnānanda samaye māraḥ pāpīyāṃstuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati,
S06n580:58: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmagrahaṇaṃ vā gotragrahaṇaṃ vā dhutaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ vā bhavati,
S06n580:59: evaṃ sa tāvanmātrakeṇa tato'nyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān peśalān kalyāṇadharmaṇo'vamanyate |
S06n580:60: te ca tasya guṇā na saṃvidyante,
S06n580:61: ye'vinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ guṇāḥ,
S06n580:62: te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tasya na saṃvidyante |
S06n580:65: parān paṃsayati-na khalvete teṣu dharmeṣu saṃdṛśyante,
S06n580:67: tatra mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāmevaṃ bhavati- na śūnyāni mārabhavanāni bhaviṣyanti,
S06n580:69: mahānirayāstiryañcaḥ pretaviṣayā āsurāśca kāyā utsadā bhaviṣyantīti |
S06n580:71: yathā te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā evaṃ pravṛttā adhyākrāntā lābhasatkāreṇa bhaviṣyanti,
S06n580:74: teṣāṃ ca sa mahājanaḥ śrotavyaṃ śraddhātavyaṃ maṃsyate |
S06n580:79: evaṃ te na tathatāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā na tathatāyāṃ pratipadyamānā na tathatāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānāḥ saṃkleśaṃ vivardhayiṣyanti |
S06n580:80: evaṃ te viparyastayā cittasaṃtatyā yadyadeva karma ārapsyante kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā,
S06n580:85: imamapyānanda arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan māraḥ pāpīyāṃstuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati ||
S06n580:86: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyati vivadati vigṛhṇīte ākrośet paribhāṣeta vyāpadyeta doṣamutpādayati,
S06n580:87: tasmin samaye mārasya pāpīyasa evaṃ bhavati-dūrīkariṣyati batāyaṃ kulaputraḥ sarvajñatām,
S06n580:88: atidūre sthāsyati sarvajñatāyāḥ sacetpunarbodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo'nyena bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyati vivadati vigṛhṇīte ākrośati paribhāṣate vyāpadyate doṣamutpādayati,
S06n580:89: tatra māraḥ pāpīyān bhūyasyā mātrayā tuṣṭo bhavati,
S06n580:91: evaṃ cāsya bhavati-ubhāvapyetau bodhisattvau dūre sthāsyataḥ sarvajñatāyā iti ||
S06n580:92: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛto'vyākṛtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdhaṃ kalahāyet vivadet vigṛhṇīyāt ākrośet paribhāṣeta vyāpadyeta doṣamutpādayet,
S06n580:94: tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittotpāde tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnāhyaḥ,
S06n580:96: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat-asti bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ cittotpādānāṃ kiṃcinniḥsaraṇam,
S06n580:97: utāho tāvata eva kalpānavaśyaṃ tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saṃnāhaḥ saṃnahyaḥ?
S06n580:98: bhagavānāha-saniḥsaraṇamānanda mayā dharmo deśitaḥ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānām |
S06n580:99: tatra ānanda yo'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyitvā vivaditvā vigṛhya ākruśya paribhāṣya vyāpadya doṣamutpādya na pratideśayati,
S06n580:104: avaśyaṃ tena ānanda pudgalena punareva tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnahyaḥ |
S06n580:105: yaḥ punarānanda bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyitvā vivaditvā vigṛhya ākruśya paribhāṣya vyāpadya doṣamutpādya pratideśayati,
S06n580:107: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayati-yena mayā sarvasattvānāṃ vigrahā vivādā virodhā utsārayitavyā nidhyāpayitavyāḥ praśamayitavyāḥ,
S06n580:113: paruṣaṃ vā karkaśaṃ vā prativaco dadāmi |
S06n580:116: parato duruktāni durāgatāni durbhāṣitāni bhāṣyamāṇāni śṛṇvatā cittaṃ nāghātayitavyam |
S06n580:127: na ca mayā svaparāddheṣvapi pareṣu vyāpattavyam |
S06n580:131: na ca mayā jīvitāntarāye'pi kriyamāṇe kṣobhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06n580:134: evaṃ cānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śrāvakayānikānāmapi pudgalānāmantike sthātavyam,
S06n580:137: kathaṃ cānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena apareṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāmantike sthātavyam?
S06n580:139: ete mama bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ śāstāra ityevaṃ sthātavyam |
S06n580:152: evaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antarāyo na bhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
